title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the synchronization process fails.
OB: The synchronization of a .java file and another resource is not possible.
EB: The synchronization process should successfully synchronize a .java file and another resource without any errors.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the project that contains a .java file and another resource. 
2. Attempt to synchronize the .java file and the other resource. 
3. Observe that the synchronization process fails and does not complete successfully.
